overview: HEY RECRUITS! Grab your fire helmets and turnout gear, because we're in training! You're going to learn how to rappel, how to handle a hose and how to open a fire hydrant. Want to know the difference between a pumper and an aerial ladder truck? Get your boots on and get ready to roll with the Fire Monsters!
tagline: Get your boots on and get ready to roll with the Fire Monsters!
title: Totally Trucks Fire Monsters
